metadata.Title: CVE-2023-51257 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An invalid memory write issue in Jasper-Software Jasper v.4.1.1 and beforeallows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: jasper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
netpbm-free: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
